item.title: Re: Arena Shop Prices?
item.content:encoded:
if you get more than a certain amount and have an arena favourite, then it costs less to get entries. i now get 10% less because i've got 100 wins and an arena favourite. so instead of paying 1500 for a second entry, it onlyy costs me 1350.

the prices of prizes don't change.

item.title: Re: Arena Shop Prices?
item.content:encoded:
If you have the Arena Favorite and win a certain number of games (the first is 100, I think), then you'll get an arena title.

The title really doesn't do anything aside from show up in your sig and give you a slight discount on arena games.

item.title: Arena Shop Prices?
item.content:encoded:
On the wiki page http://bvs.wikidot.com/store#arena there is a chart that shows that prices for the arena items decrease in cost as a player with an Arena Favorite wins more matches.

However, the costs that I see on the actual arena page (as in, the actual game page) don't reflect the costs on the wiki page.

According to the Wiki page, the Duelists Eye should cost me 8,000 points (as I own the Arena Favorite and have >250 wins), but my cost is 10,000, the regular cost according to the Wiki page.

So, my conclusion is that the Wiki page is incorrect (perhaps taking an incorrect intepretation of the discount that players receive?). Am I right in reaching that conclusion, or am I missing something? I don't want to edit the page without being absolutely sure that I'm correct.

So, does everyone else agree with me that the Wiki page is wrong?
